name: Firebolt
description: A missile of fire flies from the caster to the target, doing 6 to 12 damage plus one per caster level.  The target must be within 8 hexes of the caster.

upgrades.description: With Fireball, Firebolt now explodes on impact, doing damage to all targets within 4 hexes.
With Meteor, a swarm of meteors descends on an area with a 5 hex radius, doing 10 to 20 additional damage to all hostile targets and only one third as much damage to friendly targets.
With Burning Flames, targets now catch on fire, taking 1 point per 4 caster levels of Fire damage for 2 rounds.
